archive.title: Archive
archive.description: URL to a ZIP archive containing all the documents

collection.title: Custom Collection
collection.description: Different collection JSON URL. Otherwise using `collection.json` from archive

name.title: ZIM Name
name.description: Used as identifier and filename (date will be appended)

pagination.title: Pagination
pagination.description: Number of items per page (10 otherwise)

show_description.title: Show descriptions
show_description.description: Show items's descriptions in main list

output.title: Output folder
output.description: Output folder for ZIM file or build folder. Leave it as `/output`

zim_file.title: ZIM filename
zim_file.description: ZIM file name (based on --name if not provided)

language.title: Language
language.description: ISO-639-3 (3 chars) language code of content

locale.title: Locale
locale.description: Locale name to use for translations (if avail) and time representations. Defaults to --language or English.

title.title: Title
title.description: Title for your project and ZIM. Otherwise --name.

description.title: Description
description.description: Description for your project and ZIM.

publisher.title: Publisher
publisher.description: Custom publisher name (ZIM metadata). openZIM otherwise

tags.title: ZIM Tags
tags.description: List of comma-separated Tags for the ZIM file.

main_logo.title: Header Logo
main_logo.description: Custom logo. Will be resized to 300x65px. Nautilus otherwise.

secondary_logo.title: Footer logo
secondary_logo.description: Custom footer logo. Will be resized to 300x65px. None otherwise

favicon.title: Favicon
favicon.description: Custom favicon. Will be resized to 48x48px. Nautilus otherwise.

main_color.title: Main Color
main_color.description: Custom header color. Hex/HTML syntax (#DEDEDE). Default to main-logo's primary color solarized (or #95A5A6 if no logo).

secondary_color.title: Secondary Color
secondary_color.description: Custom footer color. Hex/HTML syntax (#DEDEDE). Default to main-logo's primary color solarized (or #95A5A6 if no logo).
